SEARCH
Package src.repository

Class AppointmentRepository

java.lang.Object
src.repository.AppointmentRepository
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAppointmentBasicOperations, IAppointmentDoctorOperations, IAppointmentPatientOperations, IAppointmentQueryOperations, IAppointmentRepository
public class AppointmentRepository extends Object implements IAppointmentRepository
Repository class for managing appointments in the system. Implements the IAppointmentRepository interface to provide CRUD operations and other appointment-related functionalities.
